triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: The paper employs backstepping as a key method to design the prescribed-time controller for high-order nonlinear systems.

triples.name: Nonlinear system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses control problems for uncertain nonlinear systems, which is the primary problem domain.

triples.name: Full state feedback
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a new state feedback control strategy as part of its prescribed-time control approach.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: The paper operates within control theory framework to ensure prescribed-time convergence of system states.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper uses adaptive technology to handle uncertain parameters in the prescribed-time stability theorem.

triples.name: Lyapunov stability
triples.relevance: Lyapunov methods form the theoretical basis for establishing the prescribed-time stability of the proposed controller.
